step_feedback.feedback: Great job finding a comfortable position! Remember to place your hands on your abdomen to feel the movement.
You're doing well with hand placement. Keep focusing on relaxing your muscles as you exhale.
Excellent! Continue to inhale through your nose and tighten your whole body, visualizing fluid moving to your chest.
Fantastic! Exhale slowly through your mouth, relaxing your muscles and visualizing pushing fluid out. You're promoting great lymphatic flow!

exercise_summary: You're doing a wonderful job with deep breathing! Remember to inhale through your nose, tightening your body, and exhale through your mouth, relaxing. This helps your lymphatic system work efficiently.
